1.0.1.name: wordpress/zartis-job-plugin
1.0.1.description:
Prices start from $99 per month

Be your own recruiter

Available in 13 different languages

Have your own jobs page directly in your WordPress site. Easily add and edit your job vacancies and securely manage candidates that apply for these jobs all in one online app.

The Zartis Job Plugin lets you quickly and easily create your own jobs page and automate much of the recruitment process.

Features

  • Jobs board is available in 13 different languages.
  • Easily tweet your job positions.
  • Easily put your jobs into Facebook
  • Candidates can apply with their LinkedIn profile.
  • All candidates profiles are stored in one central place. No more searching for email attachments!
  • Customize how your job page looks on your WordPress site

Adding the Zartis Job Plugin is simple. Even if you don't add have an open vacancy, candidates can express an interest in working for your comp
